Quest77.name: Quest77
Quest77.desc: Gives you a pocketwatch that fast forwards a day, restocking shops and triggering various daily rewards and systems. This wont impact Orion the Owl or Poppy the Kangaroo Mouse, nice try.

ClassSwapB.name: ClassSwapB
ClassSwapB.desc: Gives 1 Elite Class Swap token. Use this to swap between elite classes of a certain category, like Blood Berserker to Divine Knight

GemP25.name: GemP25
GemP25.desc: Gives you a random Circle Hyper Obol! The four equal possibilites are +4% DROP RATE, +2% ALL STAT, +3% DAMAGE, and +2% MULTIKILL PER TIER!

EquipmentHats82.name: EquipmentHats82
EquipmentHats82.desc: You can't be a real sorcerer without a big wizard hat! Comes with a +5% All Stats bonus, so your STR AGI WIS LUK will be in good hands!

desc: FREE! OH YEA!!! Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers do, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!
Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers do, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!! Yippie!!!
Instantly generate 1 hour of feathers in Orion's Feather Enterprise, a new gameplay feature in World 1! WARNING: Don't buy this until you start generating feathers, of course!
Instantly generate 1 hour of fish at Poppy's Fisheroo Pool, a new gameplay feature in World 2! WARNING: Don't buy this until you start catching fish, or you'll get 1 hour of nothing!
20% OFF! A time candy that gives a random amount of time for a nonrandom cost of gems? How inexplicable! @ These candies give up to 500 hours, but on average give 24 hrs.
99.9% OFF! FREEBIE! A time candy that gives a random amount of time for a nonrandom cost of gems? How inexplicable! @ These candies give up to 500 hours, but on average give 24 hrs.
30% OFF NORMAL PRICE! Gives you 1 World 6 cardpack. You can see the drop table in the Cards section of the gemshop.
